accuracy.description: The correctness of the identified species of bird from the specified video.

completeness.description: Whether the solution fully addressed the task's requirements, such as identifying the species and providing reasoning.

efficiency.description: How effectively the multi-agent system used resources, such as time or computational steps, to arrive at the solution.

traceability.description: The ability to follow the reasoning path of the agents to understand how the solution was reached.

relevance.description: How relevant the steps taken by the agents were to addressing the question.

robustness.description: The system's ability to handle various types of questions and adapt to different scenarios.

transparency.description: How clear and understandable the actions and responses of the agents are.

novelty.description: The degree to which the solution approach or reasoning was original or innovative.
